lore: Necron Warriors attack in rank upon shambling rank. Individually little more than mindless automata, they are relentless and deadly when commanded en masse. The Warriors’ metallic bodies can self-repair from even the most hideous damage, while their unceasing volleys of fire butcher the foe with mechanical efficiency.

faction: Their Number is Legion: Each time this unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate
it reanimates D6 wounds instead of D3 wounds
unless it is within range of an objective marker you control
in which case it reanimates D3+3 wounds instead.
